name: Sales OS

features: Create a contact and organize it by customer, lead, or team; Import your contacts from Google Contacts or Mailchimp; Capture and manage your products. Track your sales and make prognostics.; Manage your client’s orders to never miss a thing.; Create meetings with your contacts for discovery or follow-up.; Store your sales assets.; Create docs, contracts, and notes and manage them in different notebooks.; Home page with guide; Main dashboard; All-In-One view of the system
